ygData.msgSnippet: Yeha, umm duh, I posted that first thing saturday morning From: Mike Roach  They already did this and it is supposedly fixed now along
ygData.messageBody:
Yeha, umm duh, I posted that first thing saturday morning



From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>



They already did this and it is supposedly fixed now along with the somehow

mysteriously related pet aggro bug.



-Faras



> -----Original Message-----

> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]

>

> From: <kim@...>

> > We'll be taking the servers down 1 by 1 in the near future

> John H. Kim
